mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_NO, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.ITEM_INFO, I.ITEM_IMAGE, I.BRAND, M.PAYMENT FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN PAY P ON I.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.PAYMENT = M.PAYMENT WHERE M.M_IDX = #{m_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PAYMENT=#{payment} WHERE M_IDX=#{m_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (M_IDX, ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO, BU_NO, BRAND, PAYMENT) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{item_no}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_info}, #{bu_no}, #{brand}, #{payment} )
